name: unifi-voucher-site
description: unifi-voucher-site is a simple self-hosted website for generating UniFi hotspot vouchers. It connects to the UniFi controller and exposes a user-friendly form for voucher creation.
features: Voucher generation: Create UniFi hotspot vouchers with custom duration and bandwidth limits.
UniFi integration: Connect directly to UniFi controller to generate vouchers programmatically.
User-friendly form: Provide a simple web form for non-technical users to create vouchers.
Custom durations: Set voucher validity periods from minutes to days based on your needs.
Bandwidth control: Define upload and download speed limits for voucher users.
Batch creation: Generate multiple vouchers at once for events or bulk distribution.
Voucher display: Show generated voucher codes clearly for easy distribution to guests.
Access control: Restrict who can generate vouchers with authentication and permissions.
Simple deployment: Deploy quickly with minimal configuration to start generating vouchers.
Guest WiFi management: Simplify guest WiFi access management for businesses and venues.
Print-friendly: Display vouchers in a format suitable for printing and distribution.
Lightweight: Run with minimal resources suitable for small deployments.
